ygData.subject: Okay....let see....
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Again, All: Let s see what we ve learned so far...All Elves hate Dark Elves, Dwarves hate Ogres and Trolls, Barbarians hate Erudites, and Erudites
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Again, All:
Let's see what we've learned so far...All Elves hate Dark Elves, Dwarves
hate Ogres and Trolls, Barbarians hate Erudites, and Erudites hate everyone.
<Yawn> Very interesting. For about 5 minutes, 50 some-odd messages ago.
This is not what I wanted to be reading when I signed up for this
emailing list. I had hoped for some rousing tales from the bards, some bug
info, event notices, maybe even some auctions. Not child-like, immature,
boring pissing contests. I have been on the list for only a day, and it
will be my last, if I continue to receive this mindless banter. If you
feel you must continue with your "My character hates your character
because..." spam, please do the rest of us the favor of exchange email
addresses with the relevant party, or ICQ numbers, so that you may bore each
other in private, not us. Otherwise, please log into the game and take it
to the chat room, so that the rest of us may #ignore <you>.
I do not, by any stretch of the imagination, presume to speak for the
moderator of this site, nor do I wish to come across as overbearing. Let us
have a democratic vote on keeping these postings aligned with relevant
topics, please. If not a vote, then at least we can try to use our own
self-discipline and refrain from such topics as "All <insert relevant race
here> SUCK!!". Thank you.
